special_text:
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more Zombies, exile Vertilene, then return her to the battlefield transformed.
[+1]: Mill two cards. You gain 2 life.
[-2]: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
[-2]: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it has mana value 3 or less, return it to the battlefield instead. It becomes a Zombie in addition to its other types.
rules_text2:
Deathtouch
Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
{1}{B}{G}: Target Zombie gains indestructible until end of turn.
flavor_text2: [i]“Oh, Micajah. I swear to you this—these hapless souls will be saved from the darkness of Weir Astele that consumed you so wholly.”[/i]
